Description:
Notice No 311919583 (IN/MP/33/270921/1), IN served re failure to ensure that the local exhaust system in the welding shop has been thoroughly examined and tested by a competent person in the last 14 months

Notice No 311919625 (IN/MP/33/270921/2), IN served re failure to ensure that the local exhaust ventilation systems have been maintained in an efficient state, efficient working order, in good repair and in a clean condition

Notice No 311919655 (IN/MP/33/270921/3), IN served re failure to ensure that exposure to a substance hazardous to health, namely metalworking fluid used on the Mazak Vertical Centre Smart 430A CNC machine is prevented, or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled

Notice No 311919673 (IN/MP/33/270921/4), IN served re failure to ensure that where employees have been provided with tight-fitting respiratory protective equipment, that they have been face-fit tested by a competent person

Notice No  311919691(IN/MP/33/270921/5), IN served re failure to ensure you have access to competent health and safety advice in relation to assessing the risks to the health of your employees
